page.title: 13TRADE GENERAL STORES/SHOPS
page.content: The only shops in the area are Post Office General Stores and Farm shops. There are no Supermarkets,Department Stores or Hypermarkets.People travel to Sittingbourne or Maidstone for their main shopping.Bexon,Tunstall,Highsted, Woodstock and Dungate have no shops. Rodmersham Green Post Office is open 0900-1300 and 1400-1800 Monday to Saturday plus 2 hours on Sunday.It is a family business and sells household goods and newspapers as well as a range of basic foodstuffs.The Bredgar Post Office offers a similar service.There is a Farm shop in Bredgar which sells Farm products.People from other communities also use this shop.Some Farms sell their produce direct to the public and others encourage people to pick their own fruit and vegetables.
